prompt:
Looking at your chatbot app, here are key enhancements I'd recommend:
Priority Features:
1. Sidebar with configuration - Let users adjust system prompt, model, temperature without editing .env
2. Chat history management - Clear chat, save/load conversations, rename chat titles
3. Better error handling - Graceful API failures, retry logic, user-friendly error messages
4. Markdown support - Code blocks with syntax highlighting, better formatting
5. Typing indicator - Show thinking... during responses
